TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LongValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來確保`long`（64 位元帶正負號的整數） 符合特定準則。The is used to ensure a `long` (a 64-bit signed integer) meets specific criteria. 執行個體時，會建立驗證準則類別建立。The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the class is created. 建構函式時，可確保`long`正在驗證的值符合最小值和最大長度。The constructor ensures that the `long` value that is being validated adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length. 最小值和最大值的建構函式會檢查值，以及是否驗證範圍是獨占。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，以及也檢查是否值等於解析特定值。The constructor checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution value. 方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建構函式時，它會檢查最小值和最大值值，以及是否驗證範圍是獨占。When the constructor is used, it checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`、值不能介於`minValue`和`maxValue`。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between `minValue` and `maxValue`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定`resolution`、才能通過驗證，驗證的值必須是等於該值。When you specify the `resolution`, the value being validated must be equal to that value in order to pass validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含需要驗證的規則物件。The class contains the rules necessary to validate an object. 規則的執行個體時，會建立類別建立。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
